name: Due North All Purpose Ice Cleats for Shoes & Boots - Traction Spikes for Men & Women Working on Ice and Snow
short_description: FOR WORK IN SNOW AND ICE - Due North All Purpose ice cleats reduce the risk of slips and falls on snow or ice with a strategic spike and tread pattern that provides more traction in winter conditions.

OUTSTANDING TRACTION - Ice Diamond spikes made of military-grade tungsten carbide and staggered spike pattern provide grip and stability; water-channeling tread design; replaceable spikes (12 per pair)
COMFORTABLE AND EASY FIT - geometrically designed top webbing, easy on and off pull tab, and flexible rubber provide secure fits most footwear; full-foot coverage ensures all-day comfort

INDUSTRIAL USE - Designed for workers in industrial settings that are walking and working outdoors often; designed for climbing ladders or rungs with exposed heel and mid-sole; webbed toe-box design to fit work boots and footwear
MAXIMUM DURABILITY - 100% natural rubber remains flexible in extreme cold & 12 replaceable military grade tungsten carbide spikes outperform coil & steel
product_description: The Due North® All Purpose Winter Traction product is ideal for those who walk, run or work outdoors and require more stability and increased traction. Enhanced rubber compound provides added traction and secure fit while retaining elasticity in subzero temperatures. Geometrically designed top webbing and improved shape provides a more comfortable and secure fit on a greater variety of footwear. Knurled, textured lining and wide, thick heel strap grips footwear better and helps keep traction aids in place for longer wear and optimal performance. 6 tungsten carbide Due North® Ice Diamond™ Spikes, along with the bi-directional tread, provides powerful traction with maximum grip.

name: Ergodyne - 16785 TREX 6304 Step In Ice Traction Cleat with 12 Carbon Steel Spike Grips,Black,X-Large
short_description: 100% Polyester
Imported
ONE-PIECE STEP-IN DESIGN – Stretchable rubber hugs the whole sole of a shoe or boot
FULL FOOT ICE TRACTION – 12 rugged, heat-treated carbon steel studs along the length of the foot for added stability and slip protection
EASY ON/OFF – Stretchable material with a textured interior for a secure fit and thumb tabs on the toe and heel make getting on and off easy
FLEXIBLE IN EXTREME TEMPS – Tested to remain flexible in temps up to -40°F (-40°C). Stretchable rubber construction won't break in cold temperatures, providing reliable everyday traction
COMPACT SIZE – Lightweight and easy to store, available in multiple sizes and fits over any boot or shoe
REPLACEMENT STUDS AVAILABLE – TREX 6301 Replacement Studs (sold separately) are easily replaced by popping the old ones out and the new ones in
MULTIPLE SIZES – Small (5-6.5 US Mens), Medium (7-8.5 US Mens), Large (9-10.5 US Mens) and XL (11-13.5 US Mens)
product_description: The TREX 6304 Step-In Ice Cleats are lightweight ice grips for boots and shoes that provide tenacious traction and extra stability on ice and snow. Stretchable one-piece design offers grip to prevent slip and fall injuries on the ice. Contoured œstep in 3D design easily wraps around boots and shoes for a superior fit. These ice grippers feature 12 rugged carbon steel cleats on the ball and heel of foot for grip on slippery terrain. Available in multiple sizes and will fit over any style of boot or shoe for traction and stability during winter work or other winter outdoor activities. Tested to be flexible in temperatures down to -40°F (-40°C), the contoured 3D design allows you to step into these ice traction cleats for fast and easy on/off. TREX Ice Traction should fit snugly on your boot or shoe. Stretchy, one-piece design means no tightening or adjustments needed. Use your shoe/boot size to determine the approximate size.
